quotes: Shaukat Aziz (born 6 March 1949) is a Pakistani-born British former banker who served as the 15th prime minister of Pakistan from 28 August 2004 to 15 November 2007.
Previously, he served as the finance minister of Pakistan from 6 November 1999 to 15 November 2007.
He graduated from the Institute of Business Administration and later joined the corporate staff of the CitiBank Pakistan in 1969.
and became executive vice-president of Citibank in 1999.
